He is embarking on a statewide tour that he said is intended to help him determine the elected office in which he can best serve Hoosiers. We've accepted a number of speaking engagements and Republican engagements, and we'll very likely seek more. I am also going to take the opportunity to sit down with people outside the all political sphere and seek counsel, said Mike Pence , a 51-year-old Columbus, Ind., native. Mike Pence has friends in Indiana's congressional delegation and at the Statehouse, in part because he campaigned for many of them during a statewide bus tour

Trent Cole finished second in the league in total defeats, defined as the total number of plays by a defensive player that prevents the offense from gaining first-down yardage on third or fourth down, stops the offense behind the line of scrimmage or results in a turnover. Trent Cole had 26 defeats, second to only Justin Tuck . Jason Babin finished third. And Quintin Mikell finished third among safeties with nine run defeats. political operatives say he must do if he hopes to be re-elected.`` The jury is still out on which way the Bill Clinton is going to go,'' said Greg Mueller , a Republican political strategist. Will he continue to draw lines in the sand far to the left of the electorate or is he going to lurch to the middle the way Bill Clinton did to see if he can come back? The State of the Union is the kickoff of his re-election campaign. `` For a Democratic Bill Clinton to win, you have to move to the center,'' said Mike Pence Martin, a Democratic operative from Missouri.`` This country is not ready for a pure progressive.
